Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Jewish \Jew"ish\, a. 1. Of or pertaining to the Jews or Hebrews; characteristic of or resembling the Jews or their customs; Israelitish. -- {Jew"ish*ly}, adv. -- {Jew"ish*ness}, n. [1913 Webster]
2. Of, pertaining to, or characteristic of Judaism. [PJC]
Jewish adj : of or relating to Jews or their culture or religion; "He is Jewish"; "a Jewish wedding" [syn: {Judaic}]
